item.description:
UPDATE: Sambar has changed their Trivia start time to 9:30PM...

Please confirm your RSVP's on attending. I will update accordingly...

Have fun, Lonnie

Time for Trivia...

“It is a fun night and you don't have to be a Trivia wiz...We just have good old fashioned fun meeting up with new and old friends!” In the past Trivia has started promptly at 8:30PM, now it is 9:30PM and lasts about 1 1/2 hours.. You can make it an early or late night.

Socialize, laugh, answer a question - or not (like me - lol.) Every Trivia night needs spectators and/or cheerleaders..Then there are those that amaze us and themselves with knowledge...

Join us for fun, good food, and drinks...

A great night out in Newport.

We will update this event as we see others are still in town (for the holidays) and interested..

 

Happy Holidays....
item.name: Trivia at Sambar! Update: Arriving at 8:30 - Trivia Starts 9:30.
